name: Kaguya
content: Kaguya was a female Tarasin who lived on the planet Cularin. During the Clone Wars, Kaguya participated in a discussion on the nature of the benefits and problems caused to Cularin by the world's platform cities. Kaguya argued that the platform cities encroached on Tarasin land and were detrimental to the Cularin ecosystem. However, the Bothan Mirt disagreed with her views, causing the pair to starting insulting each other.
